DOC.brief_summary: We will investigate potential correlation between SpermComet DNA fragmentation assay results and IVF cycle outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Observational Correlation of Sperm Assay Results With Blastocyst Formation
DOC.detailed_description: A "SpermComet" assay will be used to characterize DNA fragmentation of surplus sperm samples remaining after in vitro fertilization (IVF) cycles. We will investigate potential correlation between these assay results and the outcomes of IVF cycles that used those sperm samples.
DOC.criteria: Undergoing IVF Surplus sperm available after oocyte insemination Consented Surgical sperm extraction Use of donated sperm or oocytes No minors may participate
